subject: Physical Fitness
title: The Phosphagen System
description: Learn The Phosphagen System in one minute.

hook.text: A sprinter explodes off the blocks. For 10 seconds, energy is instant and enormous. Then it fades.

buildup.text: The phosphagen system uses creatine phosphate to recycle ATP in milliseconds ‚Äî no oxygen needed.

discovery.text: It's the fastest energy system but holds the least fuel. Creatine stores deplete in about 10 seconds.

twist.text: This is why sprinters slow down. The phosphagen system empties and slower systems must take over.

climax.text: Full recovery takes 3‚Äì5 minutes. That's why rest between heavy lifts matters so much.

punchline.text: The fastest energy system is also the first to run dry.
